title: Drawing, "Leo, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper right: Leone 2 l'estate; in graphite, upper center: Lesta and crossed out 2. In graphite, squared off at top 1-8 with light source symbol at upper right
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Leo, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1253.
